name: Lex Temporis
description:
Reach the top of an active volcano before it’s too late.

Lex Temporis was made for Ludum Dare 51 and its theme “Every 10 seconds.” It features a hostile environment where fire rains from above and rises from below, and whose inhabitants seek to expel you from their territory. You must reach the edge of this inferno before the music ends and time runs out.

If you enjoyed this game, you might like that one game I’m making, which I’m very close to releasing. Stay tuned.

How to Play
  • WASD/Arrow keys = Move/Select
  • Enter/Space/K = Attack
  • Esc/P = Pause
  • Back = Unpause
